ferrn: Facilitate Exploration of touRR optimisatioN

Source: R/ferrn-package.R
ferrn-package.Rd

Diagnostic plots for optimisation, with a focus on projection pursuit. These show paths the optimiser takes in the high-dimensional space in multiple ways: by reducing the dimension using principal component analysis, and also using the tour to show the path on the high-dimensional space. Several botanical colour palettes are included, reflecting the name of the package.

See also
